name.en: Energy Economics: Theory, Policy and Practice I
name.ch: 能源經濟理論、政策與實務(一)

goal.en: Through the discussion of related topics in the energy field, students could understand: (1) the importance, related issues and analysis theory on balanced development of energy, environment and economic growth. (2) analysis and forecast of international oil price changes; (3) specific quantification methods of environmental costs; (4) policy evaluations and recommendations of Taiwan‘s energy policy (including climate change response, energy transition policy, oil and electricity price policy, etc.); (5) the lesson of Taiwan’s economic development after second world war until present.
goal.ch: 透過能源領域相關主題的探討，讓研究所及大學部高年級學生瞭解：(1) 能源、環境及經濟成長均衡發展之重要性、相關議題及分析理論；(2) 國際油價變動分析及預測；(3) 環境成本具體量化方法；(4) 台灣能源政策（含氣候變遷之因應、能源轉型政策、油電價格政策等）之政策評估與政策建議；(5) 戰後迄今台灣經濟發展成功及失敗成因之探討及政策建議。

content.en:
1. Course Introduction
2. Static or Dynamic Criteria for Efficient Energy Resource Allocation
3. World Oil Price and OPEC Behavior
4. (1) Crude Oil Price Analysis and Forecasting (2) Oil Price Fluctuations and Economic Growth
5. The Impact of COVID-19 on Crude Oil Price
6. The Sustainable Energy Policy and Net Zero Emission Plan in Taiwan
7. A Pragmatic Review of Taiwan’s Energy Transformation Policy
8. Taiwan’s Energy Security Indicators
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Environmental Economics
11. (1) The Effect and Analysis of Air Pollution and Carbon Tax Fee on Taiwan (2) The Study on Energy Tax, Carbon Tax and Emission Trading System
12. The Study on the Renewable Energy Development Strategy of Taiwan
13. The Effect and Analysis of Oil/ Electricity Market Liberalization
14. (1) Industrial Structure Changes and the Measurement of Total Factor Productivity Growth (2) A Comparison on Total Factor Productivity Growth in Service Sectors and ICT Industry
15. Strategy and Policy of Taiwan’s Economic Development
16. Net Zero Industry Competitiveness
17. Dragon Boat Festival- NO CLASSES
18. Final Exam
content.ch:
1. 課程介紹
2. 靜態與動態能源資源配置效率的標準
3. 國際原油價格與石油輸出國家組織
4. (1) 國際油價分析與展望 (2) 油價波動與經濟成長
5. 新冠肺炎對油價影響
6. 台灣的永續能源政策與淨零排放計畫
7. 務實檢視台灣能源轉型政策
8. 台灣能源安全指標
9. 期中考
10. 環境經濟學
11. (1) 能源外部成本內部化的分析及影響評估-空污費、石油基金、汽燃費 (2) 能源稅、碳稅及碳交易的比較分析
12. 再生能源發展計畫之成本效益分析
13. 油品和電力市場自由化的規劃及影響評估
14. (1) 產業結構變動和總要素生產力成長的量測) (2) 總要素生產力成長之國際比較-服務業和資訊與通信科技產業
15. 台灣經濟發展策略與政策
16. 淨零產業競爭力
17. 端午節放假
18. 期末考
